versionNumber.description: The version number of the entity

versionLabel.description: The user defined version label of the entity

versionComment.description: The user defined version label of the entity

modifiedBy.description: The display name of the user that last modified this entity.

contentSize.description: The size of the associated file (when applicable and available).

contentMd5.description: Calculated md5 of the associated file (when applicable and available).

modifiedByPrincipalId.description: The user that last modified this entity.

modifiedOn.description: The date this entity was last modified.
